description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**國立臺灣師範大學** **National Taiwan Normal University**

**英語** **(****一****)** **課程綱要** **English (II) syllabus**

Instructor: Huynh Hai-Long (Harry) / 黃海龍

Email: longhhuynh@ntnu.edu.tw

Class time: 週五 Friday, 3 – 4 / 10:20am – 12:20pm, 本部樸203 Main Campus Pu 203

*   **Course description**

This course aims to boost students’ English proficiency by strengthening their four English skills. In this course, there will be a wider variety of activities which motivate students to use English in their everyday life activities and enhance their communicative abilities. Students are expected to be more autonomous and active in their own learning.

*   **Course objectives:**

The course is designed to

1.  Develop students’ skills in English
2.  Enhance students’ knowledge of vocabulary and writing skills
3.  Build students’ confidence in writing in English
4.  Develop students’ teamwork and autonomy
5.  Broaden cultural and intercultural knowledge

*   **Textbook**

Macintyre, P., & Bohlke, D. (2020). _Reading Explorer 2, Third edition_. Boston, MA: National Geographic Learning.

*   Grading policy and course requirements

1.  Grading policy

1.  Attendance and participation: 10%
2.  In-class activities and quizzes: 20%
3.  Self-study (Scholastic Literacy): 10%
4.  Mid-term test: 30%
5.  Final test: 30%

1.  Course requirements 課程條件

_Attendance and participation (10%)_ _點名_

Class attendance is required and strictly checked. Students are expected to come to class every week, except for (a) hospitalized cases; or (b) emergencies; or (c) authorized absences. For these exceptions, you must show evidence **and/or** an absence form (學生請假系統). Any absence, beside the exceptions, results in _1 point_ deducted in the attendance/participation score.

_In-class quizzes (20%)_ _在教室小考_

Students are expected to take quizzes during class time. The quizzes are about the vocabulary and reading comprehension; they will be informed one week before. For example, if one quiz is on March 26th, the teacher will remind the students of the quiz on March 19th.

_Lexile test and self-study on Lexile Scholastic site (10%) Lexile__考試和上__Lexile Scholastic__網頁自學_

Students are required to take the Lexile test. This test will take place in March 2021. The score on the Lexile test, however, does NOT make up any percentage in your final grade.

Students are also asked to use Scholastic Literacy Pro website. There will be a guide on this for all students. Each student must read one assigned book and complete 10 hours of reading on Scholastic Literacy website.

_Mid-term test (30%) and final test (30%)__期中考_ _和_ _期末考_

For the mid-term test, students will take a paper test and a short oral test. Students will answer reading comprehension and vocabulary questions in the paper test. There will be **20** items in total for this paper test. After that, they will be tested orally. The interlocutor will ask them questions on everyday topic and then ask them to describe one color photograph. These questions are based on [B1 Preliminary](https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/exams-and-tests/preliminary/exam-format/) test format, Parts 1 and 2.

For the final test, students will work in pairs for an oral test (口試) and be asked questions by the interlocutor. The oral test will take about 8 minutes for each pair and will follow the format of Parts 3 and 4 in [B1 Preliminary](https://www.cambridgeenglish.org/exams-and-tests/preliminary/exam-format/) .

Here is an example of B1 Preliminary oral test: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wv\_nEUnhFFE
